resources.string: Missed call: call no longer active.
Would you like to remove %s from your contacts? The chat associated with this contact will not be removed.
Would you like to block %s from sending you messages?
Would you like to unblock %s and allow them to send you messages?
Would you like to remove %s as a bookmark? The chat associated with this bookmark will not be removed.
Glacier needs access to your microphone, camera, and media in order to connect and make secure calls.
Glacier has crashed! Please notify Glacier Security immediately if problem persists.
Unable to connect to multiple accounts
Touch here to manage your accounts
The contact is not in your roster. Would you like to add it?
Do you want to delete all messages within this Conversation?\n\nWarning: This will not influence messages stored on other devices or servers.
Are you sure you want to delete this file?\n\nWarning: This will not delete copies of this file that are stored on other devices or servers.
Decryption failed. Maybe you don’t have the proper private key.

Glacier utilizes a third party app called OpenKeychain to encrypt and decrypt messages and to manage your public keys.

OpenKeychain is licensed under GPLv3 and available on F-Droid and Google Play.

(Please restart Glacier afterwards.)
Glacier is unable to encrypt your messages because your contact is not announcing his or hers public key.\n\nPlease ask your contact to setup OpenPGP.
Glacier is unable to encrypt your messages because your contacts are not announcing their public key.\n\nPlease ask your contacts to setup OpenPGP.
Notify when a new message arrives
Vibrate when a new message arrives
Blink notification light when a new message arrives
Play sound when a new message arrives
The length of time Glacier keeps quiet after seeing activity on another device
By sending in stack traces you are helping the ongoing development of Glacier
Let your contacts know when you have received and read their messages
The file you selected is not an image
Error while converting the image file
General I/O error. Maybe you ran out of storage space?
The app you used to select this image did not provide us with enough permissions to read the file.\n\nUse a different file manager to choose an image
Unable to connect. Tap to retry
Are you sure you want to remove your OpenPGP public key from your presence announcement?\nYour contacts will no longer be able to send you OpenPGP encrypted messages.
OpenPGP public key has been published.
If you delete your account, your entire chat history will be lost
This is not a valid group name
Out of memory. Image is too large
Do you want to add %s to your address book?
Encrypted message. Please install OpenKeychain to decrypt.
Invite only groups have a 20 user recommended limit and are managed by the owner
Open groups have no user limit and store group chat history
Are you sure you want to destroy this group chat?\n\nWarning: The group chat will be completely removed on the server.
Are you sure you want to destroy this public channel?\n\nWarning: The channel will be completely removed on the server.
Contact added you to contact list
%s has read up to this point
%s have read up to this point
%1$s +%2$d more have read up to this point
Everyone has read up to this point
Touch avatar to select picture from gallery
Something went wrong while saving your picture
Something went wrong while converting your picture
Could not save avatar to disk
(Or long press to bring back default)
Your server does not support the publication of avatars
Please request presence updates from your contact first.\n\nThis will be used to determine what client(s) your contact is using.
Warning: Sending this without mutual presence updates could cause unexpected problems.\n\nGo to contact details to verify your presence subscriptions.
Allow your contacts to retroactively edit their messages
Notifications will be silenced during quiet hours
Use larger font sizes across the entire app
Received messages will be marked with a green tick if supported
Colorize send button to indicate contact status
Join and leave group chats according to auto-join flag in your bookmarks.
You are banned from this group chat
This group chat is members only
You have been kicked from this group chat
The group chat was shut down
You are no longer in this group chat
You are not connected. Try again later
Prevents the operating system from killing your connection
automatic file transmission failed, but %s is available for download
No application found to open file
No application found to open link
No application found to view contact

Are you sure you want to clear all other devices from the Glacier announcement? The next time your devices connect, they will reannounce themselves, but they might not receive messages sent in the meantime.
There are no usable keys available for this contact.\nFetching new keys from the server has been unsuccessful. Maybe there is something wrong with your contact’s server.
There are no usable keys available for this contact.\nMake sure you have mutual presence subscription.
Glacier passwords are set to require at least 8 characters, and include numbers, uppercase and lowercase letters.
New password does not meet requirements
You are trying to remove %s from a public group chat. The only way to do that is to ban that user for ever.
Make user addresses visible to anyone
Could not modify group chat options
Set 1-to-1 messages to disappear after a selected duration of time. Group messages are not affected.
Use enter key to send message
Change the emoticons key to an enter key
Let your contacts know when you are writing messages to them
No application found to display location
All certificates must be manually approved
Replace send button with quick action
You did not enter a recovery email address
If you do not enter an email, we will not be able to reset your account. This may result in loss of message and contact history.
This is not a valid username
Download failed: Could not connect to host
Download failed: Could not write file
Status is Away when screen is off
Automatically sets your Glacier status to Away when the screen is turned off
Status is Do Not Disturb in silent/DND mode
Automatically sets your Glacier status to Do Not Disturb when device set to silent/DND mode
Status is Do Not Disturb in vibrate mode
Automatically sets your Glacier status to Do Not Disturb when device is on vibrate only
Show hostname and port settings when setting up an account
Leave empty to authenticate w/ certificate
Enter the text from the image above
Chat ID does not match certificate
Your device does not support the selection of client certificates!
Tunnel all connections through the Tor network. Requires Orbot
This is not a valid port number
This is not a valid hostname
Glacier needs access to external storage
Glacier needs access to the camera

Glacier wants to match your server side contact list with your local address book to show your contacts’ full names and avatars.

Glacier will only read your contacts and match them locally without uploading them to your server.

You will now be asked to grant permission to access your contacts.

Quicksy needs access to your contacts’ phone numbers to make suggestions about possible contacts who are already on Quicksy.

We will not store a copy of those phone numbers.\n\nFor more information read our privacy policy.

You will now be asked to grant permission to access your contacts.
Glacier requires Core to be installed for this account to function properly. \n\nPlease install the application from Google Play.
Your device is doing some heavy battery optimizations on Glacier that might lead to delayed notifications or even message loss.\nIt is recommended to disable those.
Your device is doing some heavy battery optimizations on Glacier that might lead to delayed notifications or even message loss.\n\nYou will now be asked to disable those.
The selected area is too large
You already trust this contact. By selecting \'done\' you are just confirming that %s is part of this group chat.
No application found to share URI

XMPP is a provider independent protocol. You can use this client with what ever XMPP server you choose.\nHowever for your convenience we made it easy to create an account on messenger.im¹; a provider specially suited for the use with Glacier.

We will guide you through the process of creating an account on conversations.im.¹\nWhen picking conversations.im as a provider you will be able to communicate with users of other providers by giving them your full Jabber ID.
Your full Chat ID will be: %s
Set your availability when editing your status message.
A secure password has been generated
Your device does not support opting out of battery optimization
Let all your contacts know when you use Glacier
Use green background for received messages
This device is no longer in use
Report this JID as sending unwanted messages.
This may help if you\'re having problems with message delivery. All of your messages will be kept.
Regenerate your Glacier keys. All your contacts will have to verify you again.
You need to be connected to publish your avatar.

Your operating system is restricting Glacier from accessing the Internet when in background. To receive notifications of new messages you should allow Glacier unrestricted access when Data saver is on.\nGlacier will still make an effort to save data when possible.
Your device does not support disabling Data saver for Glacier.
All Glacier keys have been verified
Barcode does not contain fingerprints for this conversation.
Use the camera to scan a contact’s barcode
Please wait for keys to be fetched
Automatically trust all new devices of contacts that haven’t been verified before, and prompt for manual confirmation each time a verified contact adds a new device.
Clean cache folder (used by Camera Application)
Clean private storage where files are kept (They can be re-downloaded from the server)
I followed this link from a trusted source
You are about to verify the Glacier keys of %1$s after clicking a link. This is only secure if you followed this link from a trusted source where only %2$s could have published this link.
Are you sure you want to remove the verification for this device?\nThis device and messages coming from that device will be marked as untrusted.
Automatically delete messages from this device that are older than the configured time frame.
Not fetching messages due to local retention period.
Notify for messages received from users outside your contact list.
Received a message from a user outside your contact list
No application found to open website
When you have messages, you\'ll see them here.
Server certificates that contain the validated hostname are considered verified
Certificate does not contain a XMPP address
To keep receiving notifications, even when the screen is turned off, you need to add Glacier to the list of protected apps.
The server certificate is not signed by a known Certificate Authority.
Server could not authenticate as \"%s\". The certificate is only valid for:
Do you want to connect anyway?
The QR code scanner needs access to the camera
Scroll down after sending a message
Glacier is unable to send encrypted messages to %1$s. This may be due to your contact using an outdated server or client that can not handle Glacier encryption.
Hint: In some cases this can be fixed by adding each other your contact lists.

Are you sure you want to disable Glacier encryption for this chat session?\nThis will allow your server administrator to read your messages, but it might be the only way to communicate with people using outdated clients.
Glacier will always be used for one-on-one and private group chats.
Glacier will be used by default for new chat sessions.
Glacier will have to be turned on explicitly for new chat sessions.
The relative font size used within the app.
Glacier needs access to the microphone
Use the Share Location Plugin instead of the built in map
At ‘Start Conversation’ screen open keyboard and place cursor in search field
Host does not support group chat avatars
Only the owner can change group chat avatar
This group chat has been destroyed
Enter your password for the account %s to restore the backup.
Do not use the restore backup feature in an attempt to clone (run simultaneously) an installation. Restoring a backup is only meant for migrations or in case you’ve lost the original device.
Unable to decrypt backup. Is the password correct?
Backup files will be stored in %s
The backup files have been stored in %s
Do not forget to enable the account.
This notification category is used to display a permanent notification indicating that Glacier is running.
This notification category is used to display a notification in case there is a problem connecting to an account.
This notification group is used to display notifications that should not trigger any sound. For example when being active on another device (Grace Period).
File omitted due to security violation.
You are already drafting a message.
Open group: Users are visible to anyone.
Please provide a name for the channel
This is an XMPP address. Please provide a name.
Allow anyone to edit the topic
Invite-only group: Anyone can invite others.
Open group: Users are visible to anyone.
This public group has no participants.
This private group has no participants.
Groups tab could not be opened. Core might not be connected to server.\n\nPlease check Core for VPN status and Glacier Account for account status.
Cannot create group. Core might not be connected to server.\n\nPlease check Core for VPN status and Glacier Account for account status.
Select VPN you want to add
Click \"Continue\" to continue with the login process. Please make sure Core is connected before doing so.
Click \"Retry\" to resubmit login, password and organization id.
Click \"Logout\" to go back to login screen.
Unable to complete login process, please check Core connection.
Click to wipe all history and logout of Glacier
Unable to validate login information. Please enter login information again.
Something went wrong while attempting to connect. Check your connection to the internet and try again.
Please verify your account details and try again.
Do you really want to logout of Glacier?\n\nAll conversation and media history will be unrecoverable.
Select VPN you want to add
Secure Core is not available for this account
Please contact your system administrator for assistance or tap \'Cancel\' to go back.
Do you want to end this chat session?\n
Delete all messages in this chat session
This will not influence messages stored on other devices.
\nWarning: This will not influence messages stored on other devices.
Delete all messages in each chat session
Touch to select files to upload
Something went wrong while uploading. Retrying upload.
Something went wrong while uploading. Check your network connection and try again.
You need to be connected to upload your file.
If you are experiencing problems or are in need of additional assistance, please contact us at:
Glacier is a property of Glacier Security
Camera and Microphone permissions needed. Please allow in App Settings for additional functionality.

string.name: native_ringing
string.b: Attention --> Answering the incoming call\nwill automatically end your Glacier call.

resources.string: Calls are limited to five participants.
Set your preferred audio and video codec. Not all codecs are supported with Group rooms. The media server will fallback to OPUS or VP8 if a preferred codec is not supported.
Set sender bandwidth constraints. Zero represents the WebRTC default value which varies by codec.
Owners can edit the group name.

Enabling Core Connection adds an additional layer of encryption and anonymity to all data exiting your device.

When enabling Core Connection for the first time, Glacier will request permission to install a profile. This permission enables Glacier to protect your identity and corporate data.

Glacier does not allow your admin to see browsing history. Learn more how Glacier protects you.
You are not connected to server. Enable Core for an additional layer of encryption and anonymity
No Profiles found. Please click the button below to load your profiles. If none appear, contact your organization admin for assistance
Do you want to connect to
